Common name: School Shark, Eastern School Shark, Snapper Shark, Tope, Soupfin Shark
Orange Roughy, Deep-sea Perch, Red Roughy

EPBC Category: Considered in 2005; listed as Conservation Dependent (2010)

Fishery Assessment (AFMA): Not overfished (although one stock as subject to overfishing)

EPBC Category: Critically Endangered (2013), under threatened listing assessment (2024)

Notes: AFMA published a report on enhancing stock assessments specifically in Torres Strait.
One report mentioned export of this species, primarily its fins

Fishery Assessment (AFMA): Only incidental bycatch by longlines, no status

Notes: Cannot take as bycatch unless it's pulled dead to the boat
Report for hammerhead mentions winghead shark captures under a broader shark group. Mentioned in Hammerhead management
can trade domestically if brought up dead, if alive must be returned
